title: Turkey dinner with apricot and cashew nut stuffing
ingredients: ['2 boneless turkey breast joints, about 500g each', '1 large sweet potato', '2â€“3 large baking potatoes', '2 carrots, peeled', '6 small parsnips, peeled', '3 celery sticks', '2 leeks, trimmed', '1 red pepper', '2 tbsp olive oil', '2 tbsp runny honey', '4 tbsp vinaigrette dressing', 'STUFFING', '3cm piece fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '1 small onion, grated', '1 tbsp olive oil', '50g ready-to-eat dried apricots, finely chopped', '40g unsalted cashew nuts, roughly chopped', '40g fresh wholemeal breadcrumbs', '1 small egg, beaten', '1 tsp dried thyme']
